document_title: Hemorrhagic cystitis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, treatment
subsection_name: viem-bang-quang-xuat-huyet.json_6_Measures to support treatment and prevent recurrence
subsection_content:
Hemorrhagic cystitis has the ability to recur and progress to chronicity if the patient does not pay attention to his or her health, lifestyle and hygiene. In order to help patients with hemorrhagic cystitis shorten treatment time and prevent recurrence, the US National Library of Medicine has recommended actions to take to help patients better control their urinary health. mine. Activities to support treatment and prevent recurrence of cystitis include:
Drink a lot of water; Do not hold urine or hold urine for too long; Limit foods high in potassium such as coffee; Physical therapy for the bladder to improve function

Hemorrhagic cystitis is a serious urinary infection that can occur in anyone. The disease is at high risk in groups of people undergoing chemotherapy and radiotherapy. Hemorrhagic cystitis can be completely treated if detected and intervened early.
Therefore, the optimal method to prevent the disease is to clearly understand what hemorrhagic cystitis is as well as the clinical signs of the disease. When you suspect that you have hemorrhagic cystitis, you need to see a specialist immediately to be diagnosed and receive appropriate and timely treatment.
